attributes.action: Demand that David Cameron holds an EU referendum within the next 3 months
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has continued to stall any decision about whether Great Britain should leave the EU, and "promises" a referendum will be held by the end of 2017. Bearing in mind the current urgent situation in Europe regarding illegal economic migrants and potential radical Islamic extremists/terrorists from the Middle East and Northern Africa, - the incoming flow of which continues unabated and no doubt will increase - we request that a referendum be held as a matter of urgency within the next 3 months to let the British public decide the future of our own country, which is now a matter of considerable seriousness.
attributes.background: Bearing in mind the current urgent and worsening situation regarding illegal economic migrants and potential radical extremists from the Middle East/Africa, we demand that David Cameron holds an EU referendum within the next 3 months to let the British public decide on the future of our own country.
